document.full_text: shortly after the boston bruins lost nathan horton to a frightening injury, they found a dazzling offensive rhythm that got them back into the stanley cup finals.
document.title: bruins 8, canucks 1: bruins rally after horton's injury to beat canucks
lines_and_colors: shortly after the boston bruins lost nathan horton to a frightening injury, they found a dazzling offensive rhythm that got them back into the stanley cup finals.
